item.title: About
item.description: From Frontend to Backend, from application layer to OS layer, I have built a knowledge graph for various technologies, which helps me to learn new technologies very quickly. When I was a frontend intern, I grasped React, EventLoop and built a Functional Programming mindset, which help me a lot when comes into Java NIO and Java Stream API. I also built a strong OOP mindset after I programmed in Java
